sql.value: SELECT A.no,name,ename,orderline,marriage,birthday,joinindate,province,city,county,description FROM tbl_baseinfo A left join tbl_detailinfo B on A.no=B.no where {#condition#} order by orderline,no

sql.value: SELECT A.no,name,ename,sex,age,salary,marriage,birthday,joinindate,province,city,county,description FROM tbl_baseinfo A left join tbl_detailinfo B on A.no=B.no where {#condition#}

tabpanel.parenttitle: 使用存储过程查询报表数据

report.title: 员工信息列表

dataset.value: SELECT A.no,name,ename,sex,age,salary,marriage,birthday,joinindate,province,city,county,description FROM tbl_baseinfo A left join tbl_detailinfo B on A.no=B.no where sex=0 and {#condition#}
SELECT deptno as no,deptname as name,manager as ename,builtdate as joinindate,performance as province FROM tbl_department where {#condition#}
SELECT A.no,name,ename,sex,age,salary,marriage,birthday,joinindate,province,city,county,description FROM tbl_baseinfo A left join tbl_detailinfo B on A.no=B.no where sex=1 and {#condition#}

report.footer: <font color='red'>说明：</font><font color='blue'>此报表使用三个纵向数据集查询报表记录</font>

report.title: 员工信息列表

select.value: SELECT no,name,sex,age,birthday,deptno FROM tbl_baseinfo where {#condition#} order by no
SELECT * FROM tbl_department order by deptno

report.footer: <font color='red'>说明：</font><font color='blue'>此报表使用三个数据集，它们之间没有任何关联关系，相互独立</font>

vpanel.parenttitle: 一对一/多对一关联关系

select.value: SELECT no,name,sex,age,birthday,deptno FROM tbl_baseinfo where {#condition#} order by no
SELECT no,salary,province,city,county FROM tbl_detailinfo where {#condition#} and {#dependscondition#} order by no

report.footer: <font color='red'>说明：</font><font color='blue'>此报表使用三个数据集查询报表数据，其中“籍贯”与“所属部门”两个数据集都依赖“基本信息”数据集，依赖关系为：“基本信息”数据集与“籍贯”数据集是一对一的关联关系；“基本信息”数据集与“所属部门”数据集是多对一的关联关系；这两种关联关系配置方法一样</font>

select.value: SELECT no,salary,province,city,county FROM tbl_detailinfo where {#condition#} order by no
SELECT no,name,sex,age,birthday,deptno FROM tbl_baseinfo where {#dependscondition#} order by no

report.footer: <font color='red'>说明：</font><font color='blue'>此报表使用三个数据集查询报表数据，“基本信息”数据集依赖“籍贯”数据集，“所属部门”数据集依赖“基本信息数据集”，分别是一对一和多对一的关联关系</font>

report.parenttitle: 一对多/多对多关联关系

select.value: SELECT * FROM tbl_department where {#condition#} order by deptno

report.footer: <font color='red'>说明：</font><font color='blue'>此报表使用两个数据集查询报表数据，其中“部门信息”是父数据集，与“所含员工”数据集是一对多的关联关系</font>

dataset.value: SELECT no,name,sex,age,birthday,deptno FROM tbl_baseinfo where sex=0 and {#condition#} order by no
SELECT no,salary,province,city,county FROM tbl_detailinfo where {#condition#} and {#dependscondition#} order by no
SELECT no,name,sex,age,birthday,deptno FROM tbl_baseinfo where sex=1 and {#condition#} order by no
SELECT no,salary,province,city,county FROM tbl_detailinfo where {#condition#} and {#dependscondition#} order by no
SELECT deptno as no,deptname as name,builtdate as birthday,performance as sex FROM tbl_department where {#condition#}

report.footer: <font color='red'>说明：</font><font color='blue'>此报表纵向使用三个数据集查询报表记录，第一、第二个数据集上的记录行又使用两个横向数据集查询各列数据。</font>

sql.value: SELECT no,name,sex,age,birthday,deptname FROM tbl_baseinfo A left join tbl_department B on A.deptno=B.deptno where {#condition#} order by sex desc

SELECT A.no,name,age,salary FROM tbl_baseinfo A left join tbl_detailinfo B on A.no=B.no where {#condition#}

sql.value: SELECT A.no,name,ename,sex,age,salary,marriage,birthday,joinindate,province,city,county,description FROM tbl_baseinfo A left join tbl_detailinfo B on A.no=B.no where {#condition#} order by no

SELECT A.no,name,ename,sex,age,salary,marriage,birthday,joinindate,province,city,county,description FROM tbl_baseinfo A left join tbl_detailinfo B on A.no=B.no where {#condition#} and {#filtercondition#} order by no

select.value: SELECT * FROM tbl_department where {#condition#} order by deptno

buttons.button: wx_alert('控制提示窗口进行提示',{lock:false,width:500,height:300,title:'测试alert'}); wx_alert('默认提示');
wx_warn('控制提示窗口进行提示',{lock:false,width:500,height:300,title:'测试warn',time:0}); wx_warn('默认提示');
wx_success('控制提示窗口进行提示',{lock:false,width:500,height:300,title:'测试success',time:0}); wx_success('默认提示');
wx_error('控制提示窗口进行提示',{lock:false,width:500,height:300,title:'测试error',time:0}); wx_error('默认提示');

report.title: 部门简介列表

sql.value: SELECT * FROM tbl_department where {#condition#} order by deptno

report.footer:
说明：
    这里为报表的四个列都配置了鼠标滑过/点击时进行提示的功能。其中：
        “部门编号”列的提示信息显示在右侧，并且3秒后自动消失；
        “部门名称”列的提示信息显示在默认的下方，鼠标滑出时立即消失；
        “创建日期”列的提示信息显示在默认的下方，鼠标点击时开始提示，鼠标点击外面任意位置时立即消失；
        “部门简介”列的提示信息显示在默认的下方，鼠标滑出时延迟200毫秒再消失，可以用鼠标选中并拷出提示的内容。
